title: 4.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
A group of farmers monitors the daily rainfall for a week to make informed decisions about watering their crops. The daily rainfall measurements are collected and stored in an array. Calculate the following using the data stored in the array. (The given data is in millimeters.)



Write a Python program using an array to calculate and print the total rainfall received over the week and also calculate and print the average rainfall.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
